p: The use category with the most use-reports was that of plants used to treat jaundice with an IAR value of 0.5 (seven use-reports, four spp.), which showed the highest degree of consensus. This was followed by the detoxicant category with an IAR value of 0.37 (nine use-reports, six spp.), the insect bite/head lice category with an ICF value of 0.33 (four use-reports, three spp.), the gastritis category with an IAR value of 0.30 (14 use-reports, 10 spp.) and the tonic category with an IAR value of 0.26 (39 use-reports, 29 spp.).
